<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">state=3^EQ<item display_value="On Hold" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>demoAfterBusinessRule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var configurationitem = current.cmdb_ci;
    var shortdescription = current.short_description;
    var assignmentgroup = current.assignment_group;

    var probobj = new GlideRecord('problem');
    proobj.short_description = shortdescription;
    probobj.cmdb_ci = configurationitem;
    probobj.assignment_group.assignment_group;

    proobj.insert();
    gs.addInfoMessage(proobj.number + "ticket has been created through Incident Record");


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-19 11:05:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cb41f21397214610e0d6391e6253af06</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>demoAfterBusinessRule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Starbucks Management" source="x_1321123_starbuck">03f64bfd97598610e0d6391e6253afe1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Starbucks Management">03f64bfd97598610e0d6391e6253afe1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cb41f21397214610e0d6391e6253af06</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-19 11:05:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cb41f21397214610e0d6391e6253af06"/></record_update>
